item.description: I'm thinking to go ski on NH Resident Wednesdays: present a valid NH ID and get a $25 lift ticket! Carpool, I93 exit 4,(londonderry, nh) park and ride if anyone interested. Or arrange by yourself. Please Pay driver cash $12/pp for gas when you load the car. Have fun ski! Life open at 9am. We will meet 8:45am inside at the tables near ticket counter area. If you missed us, we come in for lunch 11:30 am to noon. I'm just a skier. For sign up, you are responsibly for your own safety and all. Strong wind cancel.
item.name: Ski Cannon Wednesday Jan 9 Th.
